content.prompt: The culture that created the work can be characterized as

choices.label: defined by social rank and a specialization of labor
composed of groups of mobile hunters and gatherers
organized into an early farming community with domesticated animals
engaged in trade with small seafaring communities on other continents

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
